name: Monument Builders - Great Wall of China: A Construction and Resource Management Tycoon Game
name_original: Monument Builders - Great Wall of China: A Construction and Resource Management Tycoon Game
description:
Construct the world's most famous wall for all to see in Monument Builders – Great Wall of China, a magnificent new building challenge! Time and resource management fans will love these challenging games!

Does not contain in-app purchasing, pay once and install the full unlocked version!

Game Features:

*Build the Great Wall of China in this colorful time management challenge
*Travel through ancient China as you lead the construction of 50 levels (full version)
*Manage workers, transport materials and gather building materials
*Get rid of crooks, secure against thieves, and trade with merchants
*10 levels free and 40 additional levels when you purchase the full version!

More apps from GameHouse:

-Delicious - Emily's Wonder Wedding
